request.description: to update the tutor details and create the tutor details. this api can be used when the tutor is already registered. for insert tutor and insert tutor details please use "Create Tutor Complete"

item.name: Get Tutor Details with Tutor ID

request.description: this api can be used to insert new user. username is the email used for logging in. in this api, we can also add user roles. (tutor, student, parents)
